text: group Landmark is the leading Auto
retail chain in India with more than 100
Outlets spread across the country we
were in discussion to actually migrate
to our International provider of cloud
services like AWS for a while and around
the same time our existing data center
had a disaster issue we had a tough time
uh getting our backups and the data
recovery that's when the decision was
taken to move to a data center a
provider who can actually give us a
stable and secure environments so the
collaboration with AWS draw right from
the get-go has been extremely smooth and
it felt like an extension of our team
they really understood the challenges
that we were facing really understood
our business requirements and
accordingly suggested the best path for
us my recommendation to peers who are
also in a similar place where they are
wondering if they should explore a large
cloud service provider like AWS would be
to keep an open mind and go for it
because uh like us I think you will also
be uh pleasantly surprised by how
approachable and how customized some of
the solutions are to businesses of this
size the biggest change since moving to
AWS has been the stability which has
actually allowed the team to focus on
the core activities rather than worry
about a loss of data or a loss of
business because of that we've been able
to be more customer Centric and focused
while having their accurate details and
information to assist them and reach out
to them on a routine on a timely basis
foreign
